thread.sender: Sarah Chen, Event Planner, Acme Corp
thread.subject: New Conference Venue Inquiry
thread.body:
Dear Sunset Vista Hotel Team,

Acme Corp is planning a large conference from October 24th to 27th, and we are very interested in your facilities. We anticipate approximately 200 attendees.  Could you please provide us with information on your conference hall availability, pricing for various room types (including suites for our speakers), and catering options for a group of this size?  We're particularly interested in the capacity of the Grand Ballroom and any potential discounts for multi-day bookings.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,
Sarah Chen
Event Planner, Acme Corp
(555) 123-4567
sarah.chen@acmecorp.com

thread.sender: Robert Miller, Hotel Manager, Sunset Vista Hotel
thread.subject: Re: New Conference Venue Inquiry
thread.body:
Dear Ms. Chen,

Thank you for your interest in Sunset Vista Hotel. The Grand Ballroom is available for your requested dates.  We can certainly accommodate 200 attendees comfortably.

We've attached a detailed pricing document outlining our rates for various room types and catering packages.  Please note that October is a peak season, and the proposed rates in your initial inquiry appear to be lower than our standard pricing for this period. 

We'd be happy to discuss potential options and explore how we can best meet your needs.  Please let me know if you have any questions.

Sincerely,
Robert Miller
Hotel Manager, Sunset Vista Hotel
(555) 987-6543
robert.miller@sunsetvistahotel.com

thread.sender: Sarah Chen, Event Planner, Acme Corp
thread.subject: Re: Re: New Conference Venue Inquiry
thread.body:
Dear Mr. Miller,

Thank you for the prompt response and the attached pricing. We understand October is peak season, and we appreciate your clarification.  Our budget is somewhat fixed, so we would like to explore options to potentially lower the overall cost. Would you be open to negotiating a package deal incorporating the Grand Ballroom rental, room blocks, and catering?

Sincerely,
Sarah Chen
Event Planner, Acme Corp
(555) 123-4567
sarah.chen@acmecorp.com

thread.sender: Robert Miller, Hotel Manager, Sunset Vista Hotel
thread.subject: Re: Re: Re: New Conference Venue Inquiry
thread.body:
Dear Ms. Chen,

We are open to negotiating a package deal. To help us understand your budget better, could you please provide us with your approximate budget for the entire conference?  We can then explore options and potentially offer a tailored package that fits your requirements.

Sincerely,
Robert Miller
Hotel Manager, Sunset Vista Hotel
(555) 987-6543
robert.miller@sunsetvistahotel.com
